fields_of_interest: Culture and media, Competition, Business and Industry, Single market, Regional Policy, Trans-European Networks, Digital economy and society
eu_initiatives: Digital infrastructure and services, funding, policy, regulation and communications involving EU telecoms
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership:
Broadband Stakeholder Group 
Co-operativesUK 
European Local Fibre Alliance (ELFA)
relevant_communication: Any relating to digital infrastructure and services, funding and policies involving the European telecoms sector
goals__remit: The members of the Independent Networks Cooperative Association (INCA) are supporting, planning, building and operating sustainable, independent and interconnected networks that advance the economic and social development of the communities they serve and permit the provision of applications and services through open competition, innovation and diversity. They are working together to create cohesive interconnected next generation networks.
